item.description:

can you please show me the full code this is waht i have so far

@echo off
COLOR 0a
title Rockhard-scape client
@echo Rockhard-scape client Is Running
@echo -----------------------
java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32
pause

where do i put that one
?

item.title: Helpme my server wont load but i made some progress from the last but still help
item.dc:creator: @Demonheadge Demonheadge
item.description:
@Demonheadge wrote:

it works but it’s the same thing but in white not green…

it come’s up with:

‘java’ is not reconised as a batch file bla bla bla…

and i have the right JAVA!! i have jdk6-10 and jre6-10!!! here is what my client says in the file

@echo off
COLOR 0a
title Rockhard-scape client
@echo Rockhard-scape client Is Running
@echo -----------------------
java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32
pause

is there any think needed to change and someone answer please… :([br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 01, 2008, 11:48:56 pm[/size][hr]hmmm i think i might got it but i will need some help… when i said Note: Some imput files use or override a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:desprecation for details.
-completed-
press any key to continue…

that is compiling it and when i said

You do not have server.class. Make sure that you have used the compiler with your server BEFORE you try runing it. Press any key to continue…

maby just maby it means i’m missing a file called server.class if so can someone make the server class up for me if not just help me GOD HELP ME I’VE BEEN AT THIS FOR WEEKS!!! PLEASE HELP![br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 02, 2008, 12:11:41 am[/size][hr]OMG i have figured it out!!! the file is missing can someone please create it for me please!!! if u do i’ll be in ur det 4ever and ever!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Helpme my server wont load but i made some progress from the last but still help
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

ok do this wut i do, goto [start] [my computer] and left click anywere and click [properties] then sumthink will pop-up lookat the right-hand-side u shud see [system protection] click that then sumthink shud pop-ip saying [continue] click that,… then goto [advanced] then goto [enviroment varibles] now goto [new] for the 1 for ur username for the [pc] call it - [CLASSPATH] and add this under that,…

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

then under that u shud see,… [system varibles] goto [new] and add this - [CLASSPATH] then add this under that,…

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin;

ooh, and change the _07 to wut eva JDK u have and the JRE,

goodluck,… hope it works,…

Read full topic

well yeah i realy need help the runserver was like that but now i cant get that one working please help me and if you do i’ll see if i can get somethink special…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 01, 2008, 02:26:56 pm[/size][hr] nope it didn’t work the screen just poped up and went away fast as a flash like my runserver did before[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 01, 2008, 02:31:45 pm[/size][hr]Btw when i go to my complier can type c for compile it comes up with this

Note: Some imput files use or override a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:desprecation for details.
-completed-
press any key to continue…

and when i click r for run

You do not have server.class. Make sure that you have used the compiler with your server BEFORE you try runing it. Press any key to continue…
